## Documentation et didacticiels

- GISMentors : [Developing QGIS Plugins](https://training.gismentors.eu/qgis-plugins/index.html)
- PyQGIS Cookbook : [Writting a plugin](https://docs.qgis.org/3.22/en/docs/pyqgis_developer_cookbook/plugins/plugins.html#writing-a-plugin)
- Create QGIS Plugin [Build your own QGIS plugin](https://create-qgis-plugin.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html)
- QGIS Tutorials and Tips : [Building a Python Plugin (QGIS3)](https://www.qgistutorials.com/en/docs/3/building_a_python_plugin.html)
- GIS-OPS : [QGIS 3 Plugin Tutorial – Qt Designer Explained](https://gis-ops.com/qgis-3-plugin-tutorial-qt-designer-explained/)
- Michal Zimmermann :
  * [Plugin Development: Getting Started](https://www.zimmi.cz/posts/2017/qgis-plugin-development-getting-started/)
  * [QGIS Plugin Development: Testing Your Code](https://www.zimmi.cz/posts/2017/qgis-plugin-development-testing-your-code/)
